---
title: "Summary of variables"
date: '`r strftime(Sys.time())`'
output: 
  pdf_document:
  df_print: kable
    
---
  
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Example
```{r example, echo=FALSE}
r <- potteR::get_summary(data)

out <- purrr::map(
    r,
    function(tt){
        knitr::kable(tt)
        }
    )

out |> purrr::map(print)
```
